    public class Simulation
extends java.lang.Object
    The main class that organizes the elements of a molecular simulation. It contains boxes, species, an integrator, a random number generator, and a controller.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Simulation

        public Simulation​(Space space)
        Creates a new simulation using the given space
        Parameters:
        space - the space used to construct Vectors etc.

    • Method Detail

      • getRandomSeeds

        public int[] getRandomSeeds​()
        Returns:
        the seeds that were used for the random number generator at construction. If the random number generator has been set manually since then, this method returns null.

      • getBoxes

        public final java.util.List<Box> getBoxes​()
        Get all boxes in the simulation.

        Attempts to add or remove boxes from this list will throw UnsupportedOperationException, you must use the addBox and removeBox methods on Simulation.

        Returns:
        a read-only list of Boxes

      • box

        public final Box box​()
        Convenience method to retrieve the first (and typically only) Box in the simulation.
        Returns:
        the Box at index 0

      • addBox

        public final Box addBox​(Box newBox)
        Adds a Box to the simulation. This method may not be called until all Species have been added to the simulation.
        Parameters:
        newBox - the Box being added.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if newBox was already added to the simulation.

      • makeBox

        public Box makeBox​()
        Creates a new Box with the default Boundary and adds it to the Simulation.
        Returns:
        the new Box.

      • makeBox

        public Box makeBox​(Boundary boundary)
        Creates a new Box and adds it to the Simulation.
        Parameters:
        boundary - the boundary to use when constructing the Box.
        Returns:
        the new Box.

      • removeBox

        public final void removeBox​(Box oldBox)
        Removes a Box to the simulation.
        Parameters:
        oldBox - the Box being removed.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if oldBox was not previously added to the simulation.

      • getBox

        public final Box getBox​(int index)
        Returns one of the simulation Boxes. Boxes are numbered in the order that they are added, beginning with 0.
        Parameters:
        index - specifies the Box to be returned.
        Returns:
        the specified Box.

      • getBoxCount

        public final int getBoxCount​()
        Returns:
        the number of boxes that have been added to the Simulation.

      • getController

        public final Controller getController​()
        Returns:
        the Controller used to run the simulation's Actions and Activities.

      • getSpace

        public final Space getSpace​()
        Returns:
        the Space that was specified in the constructor.

      • getRandom

        public final IRandom getRandom​()
        Returns:
        the Simulation's random number generator.

      • setRandom

        public void setRandom​(IRandom newRandom)
        Set the simulation's random number generator to the given one.
        Parameters:
        newRandom - the new random number generator.

      • getEventManager

        public final SimulationEventManager getEventManager​()
        Returns:
        the Simulation's event manager, which fires events for Boxes and Species being added and removed.

      • addSpecies

        public final void addSpecies​(ISpecies species)
        Adds species to the list of all ISpecies in the simulation, and notifies all Boxes of the addition.
        Parameters:
        species - the Species being added.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if species was already added.
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if a Box has already been added to the simulation.

      • getSpeciesCount

        public final int getSpeciesCount​()
        Returns:
        the number of Species in the Simulation.

      • getSpecies

        public final ISpecies getSpecies​(int index)
        Returns one of the simulation ISpecies. ISpecies are numbered in the order that they are added, beginning with 0.
        Parameters:
        index - specifies the ISpecies to be returned.
        Returns:
        the specified ISpecies.

      • getSpeciesList

        public final java.util.List<ISpecies> getSpeciesList​()

      • species

        public final ISpecies species​()
        Convenience method to return the first (and often only) ISpecies in the simulation.
        Returns:
        the ISpecies at index 0

      • makeUniqueElementSymbol

        public java.lang.String makeUniqueElementSymbol​(java.lang.String symbolBase)
        Method to allow generation of unique string to identify Elements in the Simulation.
        Parameters:
        symbolBase - the base string.
        Returns:
        an Element symbol starting with symbolBase that does not yet exist in the Simulation. Return values will be like "base0, base1, base2..."

      • getIntegrator

        public Integrator getIntegrator​()
        Returns:
        the Simulation's primary integrator. If the controller holds multiple integrators, the first is returned. If the first integrator holds sub-integrators, the top-level integrator is still returned. This method assumes the controller holds an ActivityIntegrate. Returns null if no integrator is found.
